wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Robert Tudor Davies CBE (born 1968) is a Welsh Conservative politician, serving as Leader of the Welsh Conservative Group in the Senedd since 2021, and previously from 2011 to 2018. He has been a Member of the Senedd (MS) since 2007.He was elected Leader of the Welsh Conservatives in the Senedd on 14 July 2011, resigning the position on 27 June 2018. He was re-appointed as Welsh Conservative leader on 24 January 2021, following the resignation of Paul Davies.
